Il gioco e molto carino, mi piace molto, la texture e molto leggera, semplice. I portali e i movimenti che accadono quando gli attraversi sono davvero fantastici, molto fatti bene. La cosa che mi mette ansia √® la voce femminile del robot che c,√® nel gioco, e il momento finale, mi mette molto ansia il mega robot da cui proviene la voce [ Non ho specificato perch√© √® molto spoiler quello che voglio intendere. Lo consiglio veramente a tutti anche per chi ha un PC dell'itis, io lo gioco con un portatile acer con un processore Ryzen 3

My rating: 95/100

An amazing game, and by far one of the best that I've ever played!! GLaDOS is one of my favorite characters in any media, ever. I have so many good feelings about this game, I'm just so happy that exists ^_^ Truly a reolutionary piece of its time. I wish I had gotten into it way sooner! :))
[spoiler] First you will be baked, and then there will be cake [/spoiler]
The game is relatively short, but also cheap so that is reasonable. It's a cool puzzle game with a bit of adventure and action mixed in.
Awesome game with challenging puzzles (more complex if you wanna do all the achievements) and...with a cake in the end :]

its good played it a little

portal? more like "fuccing great game".

Weee Weee portals great game and it old and funny

This game is incredible. You don't need me to tell you that, though. You can find hundreds of positive reviews praising this game. It's simple, but it allows it to be so incredibly intentional with every element. If you have not played this game, you need to. Get the Portal 1 and Portal 2 bundle and play the games. You won't regret it.

The only thing that sucked about this game was that it was too short and back before Portal 2 was released, such a frickin TEASE!!!!!! If you like solving puzzles, you'll love this game for what it is; a Portal 2 trailer, lol. As soon as your done with this game, just delete it and continue on to Portal 2. Lucky for you, there is no wait time after completing the first edition, which was nearly 3 and a half years!!!!!
i absolutely recommend this to any one who likes puzzles it is somewhat short but apart from that it is perfect
why are you reading reviews, just buy it.

Lo recomiendo encarecidamente, ademas, contiene datos importantes sobre black mesa y una canci√≥n tremenda al final ;D
For a game that can be completed in 90 minutes this is a 10/10. One of the best games of all time! Still holds up a decade later for sure.
This is a classic; you don't need me to tell you that. A masterclass in puzzle design and sarcastic robot humor.
great game and only for two bucks its a must buy!

Fantastic game to start with, I do highly recommend you to play Portal 2 since the campaign is way longer, it has a co-op mode, custom maps and a way deeper story. But I do recommend you to start with this one to get familiar with the series

For 2007, really a great game. While Portal 2 was a MUCH better sequel, I did enjoy this game. I wish they added more levels, but I guess Portal 2 compensated for that. I highly recommend getting the Portal bundle, as this game alone is not as fun. (I'm a bit of a story guy, Portal 2 helped with the story) A really fun game overall, highly recommended for most ages, probably over 10. (A bit dark at times) I would give it 4 stars.
